file_content.text: Mmm! Mmmph!
Hey! What are you doing poking around here?
The only arrival code we've received is for Imperial Starship 2423T6H3L5. Pilot Lieutenant Commander Ina'irolia'kleoni, of the Chiss alliance.
I've got two dozen heavily armed mercenaries in that ship, with blaster rifles targeted on you. Let me pass, or I give them the signal.
You're outnumbered. Surrender.
You're bluffing.
Someone like you could never put together that kind of force.
Are you really willing to gamble that I don't have at least one man who could blow your brains to jelly in a single shot?
Don't bet your life on it.
You didn't think we'd take on an entire Imperial treasury ship ourselves, did you?
You ever seen what a Zabrak Tystel Mark 3 does to a man's face?
Stand down, human!
Why not just kill him? Are you trying to save ammo?
You should listen, man. You ever heard of the Valence Space Station debacle? This is the crew that took down Moff Kilran!
I told them we needed a bigger unit to guard this ship!
I'm not dying just because treasury won't spend the same blasted money they expect me to guard!
Do what you want with me. I won't stop you.
Would you believe a dozen mercenaries? An intergalactic bank robber and his idiot savant partner?
Maybe I exaggerated a little?
I know I don't look very Chiss. My parents were surprised, too.
Uh, that's me.
Who are you? This is a Clearance 5 area. Drop your weapons and show your ID, or I shoot!
Didn't you get the memo from intel? I'm here to investigate a suspected robbery. You're supposed to play along.
I'm undercover.
I don't know....
Come on... would anyone make up that ridiculous story?
If you hesitate, we'll miss our chance to catch the robber in action!
Obey!
You're wasting time. Just shoot him and tell them to order another.
You need to talk to Fixer 55. This is his mission, and he's not known for dealing nicely with people who mess it up.
I'll go check in with Command. You wait right here.
Would you believe me if I said it's in my other pants?
Um... I don't have ID.
Some people just don't know how to shut up and play along.
So much for lying. [Kill him]
Do you really want to be talking about stuffy landing permits at a time like this?
[Flirt] Forget that.
What are you--? Oh... oh! Oh, no... oh, no. I'm on duty!
I can't very well get into trouble if I'm with you, right?
Take a break.
True. I can, ah, take you into the other room for a strip search. Heh.
Or, ah, maybe just right here....
Blaster's faster.
Heh heh. That rhymed.
Just show me your rooms and I'll wait until you get off.
[Flirt] How about later?
No! You... you impertinent vixen! I will not be seduced away from my duties! My love of the Empire is as the sun to--
Oh, for the love of--!
Move it along, Captain.
All work and no play makes you die young.
Your loss. [Kill him]
What in the world can that be?
Look over there! [Attack him]
What? What are you--? Aaaaah!
Nice.
Get the vaults, Combo.
When he's got the security down, we should split up, hit as many vaults as we can before they lock down again.
Meet you back here when we're done.
You're an idiot. [Kill him]
